exam.question: England’s team, who are now superbly fit, will be doing their best next week to ______ themselves for last year’s defeat.

answer.explain: 句意： 正处在最佳状态的英格兰队将会在下星期尽全力为去年的失利挽回颜面。revive： 使苏醒， 使复兴； retort： 反驳， 反击； remedy： 补救， 矫正。

exam.question: The Spanish team, who are not in superb form, will be doing their best next week to ______ themselves on the German team for last year’s defeat.

answer.explain: 句意： 虽然不是最强阵容， 但西班牙队仍要在下星期尽全力击垮德国队来报去年败北的一箭之仇。reproach： 责备。

sentences.sContent: The attackers were said to be taking revenge on the 14-year-old, claiming he was a school bully.
sentences.sCn: 攻击者被称是在报复一名14岁男孩，称他是学校一霸。

phrases.pCn: 向某人报仇[亦作revenge oneself on someone]

remMethod.val: re(一再) ＋ venge(报仇) → 报仇， 报复

words.tran: 深藏仇恨的；燃起复仇念头的

trans.tranOther: something you do in order to punish someone who has harmed or offended you
to punish someone who has done something to harm you or someone else
